cleaned_text: Complementary and Alternative Medicines - herbal remedies and supplements This leaflet, from the Royal College of Psychiatrists, is for anyone who would like to try complementary medicines for a mental health problem. This leaflet, from the Royal College of Psychiatrists, is for anyone who would like to try complementary medicines for a mental health problem. It covers: Brain function and dementia Anxiety and sleep problems Depression and bipolar disorder Psychotic states Movement disorders Addictions Finding a practitioner Useful websites Herbal remedies and
